name: claudepost
description: ClaudePost enables seamless email management for Gmail, offering secure features like email search, reading, and sending.

tools.name: search-emails
tools.description: Search emails within a date range and/or with specific keywords

keyword.description: Keyword to search in email subject and body (optional)

folder.description: Folder to search in ('inbox' or 'sent', defaults to 'inbox')

tools.name: get-email-content
tools.description: Get the full content of a specific email by its ID

email_id.description: The ID of the email to retrieve

tools.name: count-daily-emails
tools.description: Count emails received for each day in a date range

tools.name: send-email
tools.description: CONFIRMATION STEP: Actually send the email after user confirms the details. Before calling this, first show the email details to the user for confirmation. Required fields: recipients (to), subject, and content. Optional: CC recipients.

cc.description: List of CC recipient email addresses (optional, confirmed)

prompts.name: Search Emails
prompts.description: Search for emails using natural language commands.
prompts.text: Show me emails from last week.

prompts.name: Read Email Content
prompts.description: Request to read specific email content.
prompts.text: Show me the content of email #12345.

prompts.name: Send Emails
prompts.text: I want to send an email to john@example.com.
